pronunciation: ED'IFY, [Latin oedifico; oedes, a house, and facio, to make.]

definitions.text:
1. To build, in a literal sense. [Not now used.
2. To instruct and improve the mind in knowledge generally, and particularly in moral and religious knowledge, in faith and holiness. one another. 1 Thessalonians 5:11.
3. To teach or persuade. [Not used.]]
